data.description:
Townsmen VR uses the exciting possibilities of virtual reality to further enhance the classic city-building game with entirely new gameplay experiences and interactive mechanics. The game combines elements of a God-game simulation and a classic building game with the interactive possibilities of VR controls. Whether from a bird's eye view or zoomed-in close, you will always experience the action from the right perspective.

Start with a small settlement and expand your might over a world of 13 different islands and archipelagos. Filled to the brim with exciting features, gizmos, and things to lay your virtual hands on. Build more than 20 unique buildings and upgrade them. Immerse yourself in a thrilling story with many exciting quests that will provide you with hours of fun!

Most of the islands you visit during the campaign can be unlocked for unrestricted play in the sandbox mode – the various settings offer you enough freedom for your personal gaming experience!

● A fully-voiced campaign and story arching over 13 islands.
● Assign jobs and tasks to your villagers to build your supply chains and economy.
● Unlock more than 20 unique buildings and place them freely within your village to optimize transport routes. Apply upgrades to make them better!
● Recruit brave soldiers, and build catapults, bows, and crossbows to protect your island from raiding henchmen.

changelog.change_log:
* Fixed player position not always being saved in Sandbox Mode.


* Enemy AI fixes in Sandbox levels: Smuggler's Cave, Volcano Island, Fort Haven
Fixed a bug where switching languages to Spanish or Brazilian Portuguese didn't work.

More reliable pointer
When using the build menu, you always had the option to grab the buildings directly with your hand or with the pointer ray. This pointer had some issues that made it a much less reliable tool. Buildings in the build menu rotated faster when you point anywhere on the panel. Now they only rotate faster when you directly point at them to indicate you can now grab them. We also fixed issues that prevented you from picking up construction sites directly after being placed on the ground. This should make readjusting the position and rotation much easier.
 
Show new buildings
When new buildings are unlocked during tutorials, they are now not just highlighted with a glow effect in the build menu, the build menu now also actively scrolls to the new item. This should help new players who might not have found out yet that there are more than the initial 3 buildings per category to choose from.
 
Bugfixes

Achievement Fixes
- Fixed issues with achievement Chicken Shaker unlocking too early.
- Refined progress tracking for achievement Artisan Builder.
- Fixed issue with achievement Treasure Hunter not being tracked after save & load.
 
Ship fixes
- Fixed ship navigation issues, optimized ship routes and improved ship landing behavior.
- Fixed lost trade goods on returning trading ship after loading.
 
AI fixes
- Improved movement of ranged units.
- Made thieves return to enemy base after stealing in Sandbox mode.
- Fixed missing thief spearmen on Fort Haven (Campaign + Sandbox), Smuggler's Cove, Volcano Island (Campaign + Sandbox).
- Changed color for thieves back to yellow.
 
Island fixes
- Added highlight to fishing spot on Solitary Island.
- Unblocked some spots for building placement - especially Volcano Island.
- Balanced timing of lava streams.
 
General fixes
- Fixed highlights on player-interactable objects and made the interactions more robust.
- Fixed clouds drifting away from play area.
- Added fallback to english for officially unsupported languages.
- Fixed an issue where the "thin chicken" wasn't ever spawned from the henhouse.
